articles.title: ‘Extreme lengths about how I decorate for Christmas’: Greater Boston holiday house tours open doors to the private homes everyone’s curious about
articles.description:
“I feel when you have a historic home, you’re really the steward of the home, and it’s important to share it.”

The post ‘Extreme lengths about how I decorate for Christmas’: Greater Boston holiday house tours open doors to the private homes everyone’s curious about appeared first on Boston.com.
